nodes.text: Noru was a male Kyuzo warrior who belonged to the Data Seekers of the Anoat sector. He pushed himself to endure the Kouhun initiation trials so the Seekers would have someone on the inside to learn about the Kouhun society.
Several months into the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, Noru joined the crew of a young smuggler from Burnin Konn, assisting them on various missions throughout the sector.
